name: PressPad
tag_list: mobile-publishing, mobile, crossplatform, saas, ios, android, desktop
overview:
PressPad is a mobile publishing platform for B2C, publishers and custom publishing business.

For individuals PressPad is the simplest way to wrap up memories in slick, easy to use booklet to share on tablets and Facebook.

From business perspective three main characteristics od PressPad are:

  • Crossplatfrom â€“ PressPad was designed around flexible content format that enable publishers to deliver for iOS, Android, Windows, OS X, Linux (with more to come)
  • Software as a Service and pay-per-issue models â€“ PressPad can be used as SAAS software for publishing houses or with one time payment method for custom publishing.
  • Easy to use, flexible and feature rich â€“ product on itself is easy to use, doesnâ€™t require teams of highly qualified DTP operators, and no software/hardware investment from publisher.

PressPad is based on open HTML and CSS formats, and wrapped in native box of iOS/Android/Desktop application. With that kind of approach it gives publishers way to publish content once, and gets it delivered to many platforms. For less demanding needs PressPad also gives publishers option to upload their PDF files nad start with this technology.

About company: PressPad was founded in march 2011 by PaweÅ‚ Nowak, Marcin Klimek and RafaÅ‚ Guzik â€“ people working e.g. on Woblink.com, the biggest ebook platform for mobile devices in Poland (founded by Wydawnictwo Otwarte) In PressPad invested “Innovation Nest”, VC company founded by Piotr Wilam, co-founder of Onet.pl (biggest Polish news/entertainment portal).

Contact: PaweÅ‚ Nowak, CEO and co-founder paul@presspadapp.com +48 603 855 969

PressPad HQ is located in the beautiful city of Cracow, Poland.
